summary: Both REQ-24 and REQ-25 appear to be substantially implemented. REQ-24 is addressed via refactored DimensionInput.tsx and DoorEntryForm.tsx with fraction parsing, stacked vertical inputs, correct placeholders, helper text, error states, catalogue badge, and '+ Add Door Size' button. REQ-25 is addressed via onClearDoors callback in App.tsx and QuotationView.tsx calling it after WhatsApp share. One minor gap exists: the helper text for the width input uses '30.25' examples instead of the spec-required '79.25' examples. A hallucinated extra button may have been added to QuotationView.

missing_requirements.requirement: Helper text below each input must read 'Enter as decimal (79.25) or fraction (79 1/4, 79 3/8)' for both height and width inputs
missing_requirements.reason: The width input helper text in DimensionInput.tsx reads 'Enter as decimal (30.25) or fraction (30 1/4, 30 3/8)' rather than the specified identical text for both inputs

hallucinated_features.description: A second 'Share via WhatsApp & Clear' button added at the bottom of QuotationView
hallucinated_features.reason: The file summary mentions 'a bottom Share via WhatsApp & Clear button is added' which was not requested â€” REQ-25 only requires clearing state after the existing WhatsApp share action, not adding a second button
